channel.title: Project-Exile Release [Eco source]
channel.description:
Sup it's Raw Envyy here, I've decided to release my server which I've hosted on two occasions I've reached 168 players online and 60+ online at all times. The source is good and stable but I never really liked the client to much..
Note: This was the first ever server I programmed rofl, decided to start programming a server from scratch as very soon I'm going to college and studying game development and such and then hopefully moving onto progressing to do it in university.
Server package download: http://www.mediafire.com/?vnkbkmi7274ladi Make sure you move the cache to your user folder not C drive.
A few features: All known dupes fixed 2 starters per IP Improved item switch for hybriding Zoom in & out feature on client Slayer points and Pk points system Items kept on death working 100% with all correct interfaces and with the tab in correct place All correct block animations and enhanced combat system Stable source I held 130 players on 2GB VPS with no lag All deadlock's fixed Fully working duel arena with all dupes fixed. All working mini-games, could do with some work on though tbh I didn't get around to it.. All unique areas for everything with some cool unique features. All nex armours with hp bar updating and allows you get get 139 hp. All skills working including summoning and hunter, most skills are fairly basic I haven't done to much work to them. The source has a few known bugs/glitches but not many, I've fixed a fuck ton of them. Zoom in & out feature on the client and stuff. Not bad combat I've done some work on it and it's a lot better than it was. Loads of bosses all working and stuff lul Clipped following Clipped NPC's A few summoning scrolls work 100% with the tab special attack button like Wolpentiger, yak and shit sort of quit before I had time to make all of them just PM me if you need any help adding any more. Fully working fun pk with no bugs/glitches Many unique features [table] [tr] [td] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/randompicture.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/itemskeptondeath-1.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/donatorzone-2.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/summoning-2.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/skills.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/tormenteddemons-1.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/bosses-1.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/nexarms.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/wolperspec.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/auto-casts.png[/img] [img]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/staffblockanim.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]

item.title: Project-Exile Release [Eco source]
item.dc:creator: @raw_envyy raw envyy
item.description:
@raw_envyy wrote:

Sup it’s Raw Envyy here, I’ve decided to release my server which I’ve hosted on two occasions I’ve reached 168 players online and 60+ online at all times. The source is good and stable but I never really liked the client to much…

Note: This was the first ever server I programmed rofl, decided to start programming a server from scratch as very soon I’m going to college and studying game development and such and then hopefully moving onto progressing to do it in university.

Server package download: http://www.mediafire.com/?vnkbkmi7274ladi
Make sure you move the cache to your user folder not C drive.

A few features:
All known dupes fixed
2 starters per IP
Improved item switch for hybriding
Zoom in & out feature on client
Slayer points and Pk points system
Items kept on death working 100% with all correct interfaces and with the tab in correct place
All correct block animations and enhanced combat system
Stable source I held 130 players on 2GB VPS with no lag
All deadlock’s fixed
Fully working duel arena with all dupes fixed.
All working mini-games, could do with some work on though tbh I didn’t get around to it…
All unique areas for everything with some cool unique features.
All nex armours with hp bar updating and allows you get get 139 hp.
All skills working including summoning and hunter, most skills are fairly basic I haven’t done to much work to them.
The source has a few known bugs/glitches but not many, I’ve fixed a fuck ton of them.
Zoom in & out feature on the client and stuff.
Not bad combat I’ve done some work on it and it’s a lot better than it was.
Loads of bosses all working and stuff lul
Clipped following
Clipped NPC’s
A few summoning scrolls work 100% with the tab special attack button like Wolpentiger, yak and shit sort of quit before I had time to make all of them just PM me if you need any help adding any more.
Fully working fun pk with no bugs/glitches
Many unique features
